Package org.tquadrat.shootingtimer

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
org.tquadrat.shootingtimer.MainController
@ClassVersion(sourceVersion="$Id: MainController.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $") @API(status=STABLE, since="0.1.0") public class MainController extends Object
The main controller for the Shooting Timer application.
Author:
Thomas Thrien (thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org)
Version:
$Id: MainController.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $
Since:

    The name for the preference node that stores the last used heat for the current discipline: "/Discipline/Heat".

    The name for the preference node that stores the show heat count flag: "/Show/HeatCount".

    The name for the preference node that stores the "show time" flag: "/Show/Status".

    resources
    The injected resource bundle.
    static final String
    SOUND_ENDSHOOTING
    The file name for the end sound: "chinese-gong-daniel_simon.mp3".

    SOUND_STARTSHOOTING
    The file name for the start sound: "foghorn-daniel_simon.mp3".

    TIMERBOX_WIDTH
    The width for the fields in the timer box: 200.0.

    • statusTransition

      private final void statusTransition(ObservableValue<? extends Status> ignoredObservable, Status oldStatus, Status newStatus)
      The change listener for the status control.

      This method controls the current display.
      Parameters:
      ignoredObservable - The observed entity; ignored.
      oldStatus - The previous status.
      newStatus - The new status.
